withinTheFirstMonth: Within the first month of partnering with Sendy, we were able to restock three times. Sendy Fulfillment was the bridge we needed in order to run a successful online business.
ourSalesIncreased: Our sales increased by 40% when we started using Sendy. The app is one of the easiest to use. At the tap of a button you are able to see what's happening to your deliveries and stock levels.
growthIsEverything: With Sendy Fulfillment, the growth that I have experienced is everything. If you are looking for  a logistics partner, I would highly recommend them.
weAreNowAbleToDeliver: We are now able to deliver books to far regions where we wouldn't be able to reach. With Sendy Fulfillment, our business has all the support we need to maximize our potential in the online market.
forAnyoneDoingOnlineBusiness: For anyone doing online business, Sendy Fulfillment is the right partner. It will save you time, money and help you focus on growing your business.
